name: How to shoot a criminal
description: Plunge into the dark ambiance of the 30's through the memories of a journalist working under an out-of-control editor who has become dangerous. Find the videos, the records, the radio programs and the reporter's notebooks. Piece the story of a unique newspaper together. Unlock its secrets. Bring it down from the inside.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 M380 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 650 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible directX
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 M380 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 650 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible directX
